snippet: The focus after a victory over the Chicago Bulls in Game 4 on Sunday was on two blunders Blatt, Cleveland’s coach, was perceived to have made in the waning seconds.
abstract: Cleveland Cavaliers coach David Blatt has drawn intense scrutiny for two perceived errors he made during team's buzzer-beating playoff victory over the Chicago Bulls; attempted to call timeout when team had none remaining, and put forward last-minute play that was rejected by star forward LeBron James, who scored the game-winning shot.
lead_paragraph: The focus after a victory over the Chicago Bulls in Game 4 on Sunday was on two blunders Blatt, Cleveland’s coach, was perceived to have made in the waning seconds.

headline.main: David Blatt Draws Scrutiny After Cavaliers’ Crucial Victory
headline.print_headline: Cavaliers Coach Draws Scrutiny After Crucial Victory
